author: Samuel Claiborn
title: Rule Your Island with Every Tool and Shop Unlocked in Animal Crossing
description: Animal Crossing New Horizons is quite different from other Animal Crossing games, as you won’t have everything handed to you. Instead, you’ll
content:
How to Unlock Every Tool[edit]
When you first arrive on your deserted island in New Horizons, youll have nothing to your name, and there wont be any stores to acquire important tools like shovels and nets. Instead, youll have to learn how to make these items… [+19605 chars]
